channel.title: Adding the ::god command to a server
channel.description: anyone know how to add the command ::god so I can fly?

item.title: Adding the ::god command to a server
item.dc:creator: @fantom fantom
item.source: Adding the ::god command to a server

item.title: Adding the ::god command to a server
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sm("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 2) { sm("god mode off"); setAnimation(760); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: Adding the ::god command to a server
